name: Bibsonomy Silk
description: Better space utilization. Replace bulky monochrome icons with Silk icon set.
additional_info:
Credits

  • CSS code by ShelleyVAdams CC-BY 3.0.
  • Icons marked "Custom Silk" by ShelleyVAdams CC-BY 2.5 based on Silk Icon Set v1.3 by Mark James.
  • All other icons from Silk icon set v1.3 by Mark James CC-BY 2.5.

Style-specific Notes

Delete item (a.item.delete, span.item.idelete)
Style includes the Silk bin icon as an alternative to bomb. To switch, comment out the background-image style attribute for bomb and un-comment the background-image style attribute for bin.

Update notes

June 26, 2014
div.headerLogo.image.editTags now uses the same icon (tag_blue_edit) as li.sidebarnavi_entry_04
April 28, 2014
Added rules for a.item.communitypost.
Fixed bug where the bottom of action icons within a post sometimes extended beyond the bottom of the post background.
June 12, 2013
Link images: Remove item from clipboard, Delete attached document, Refresh tags, Refresh BibTeX key
List image: Attached document
